query.statement:
SELECT MANDT, UPN, CST, MAX(GNO) GNO, MAX(KND) KND, MAX(CHASU_1) CHASU_1, MIN(SDATE) SDATE, MIN(UGS) UGS, MAX(EDATE) EDATE, SUM(UMS) UMS, SUM(AMT) AMT, MAX(CS121_GNO) CS121_GNO, MAX(ADT) ADT, FMY, CHASU, MIN(SDATE)|| '~' ||MAX(EDATE) DATE, MAX(CNT) CNT ,MAX(ZSPEC3/(CNT+#CNT_S#)) ZSPEC3 ,MAX(INT(ZSPEC7)) ZSPEC7 FROM ( SELECT CS121B.MANDT, CS121B.CS121_UPN UPN, CS121B.CS121_CST CST, COALESCE(X.GNO,'') GNO, CASE WHEN COALESCE(MAX(X.KND),'') > '' THEN 'FM' ELSE '' END KND, CASE WHEN COALESCE(MAX(X.KND),'') > '' -- THEN SUBSTR(COALESCE(MAX(X.AYM),''),1,4) || '년' || '-' || COALESCE(MAX(X.FMS),'') || '년차' THEN SUBSTR(COALESCE(MAX(X.FMY),''),1,4) || '년' || '-' || COALESCE(MAX(X.FMS),'') || '년차' ELSE '' END CHASU_1, COALESCE((X.USD),'') AS SDATE, COALESCE((X.UGS),'') UGS, COALESCE((X.UHJ),'') AS EDATE, COALESCE((X.UMS),0) UMS, COALESCE(MAX(X.AMT),0)*UMS AMT, -- COALESCE(MAX(X.AMT),0) AMT, CS121B.CS121_GNO CS121_GNO, COALESCE(MAX(X.ADT),'') ADT, -- TRIM(CHAR(ROWNUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CS121B.CS121_UPN, CS121B.CS121_CST, CASE WHEN COALESCE(MAX(X.KND),'') > '' THEN 'FM' ELSE '' END, COALESCE(MAX(X.AYM),'') ORDER BY CASE --WHEN COALESCE(MAX(X.KND),'') > '' THEN 'FM' ELSE '' END, COALESCE(MAX(X.AYM),''), COALESCE(X.GNO,'') ASC))) || '년차' AS CHASU, COALESCE(MAX(X.FMS),'') || '년차' AS CHASU, COALESCE((X.USD),'')|| '~' ||COALESCE((X.UHJ),'') AS DATE, COALESCE(MAX(X.FMY),'') FMY, MAX(X.CNT) CNT, MAX(X.ZSPEC3)+(1.82*COALESCE(#CNT_S#,0)) ZSPEC3, MAX(X.ZSPEC7) ZSPEC7
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST121 CS121B LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT '' CHK, '' FLAG, CS126B.MANDT, CS126B.CS126_UPN UPN, CS126B.CS126_CST CST, CS126B.CS126_GNO GNO, COUNT(*) CNT, SUM(CASE WHEN DECODE(ZM02.ZSPEC3, '' , 0, ZM02.ZSPEC3) < 90 THEN 1.72 WHEN DECODE(ZM02.ZSPEC3, '' , 0, ZM02.ZSPEC3) > 89 AND DECODE(ZM02.ZSPEC3, '' , 0, ZM02.ZSPEC3) < 120 THEN 1.76 WHEN DECODE(ZM02.ZSPEC3, '' , 0, ZM02.ZSPEC3) > 119 AND DECODE(ZM02.ZSPEC3, '' , 0, ZM02.ZSPEC3) < 180 THEN 1.82 WHEN DECODE(ZM02.ZSPEC3, '' , 0, ZM02.ZSPEC3) = 0 OR DECODE(ZM02.ZSPEC3, '' , 0, ZM02.ZSPEC3) = 000 OR DECODE(ZM02.ZSPEC3, '' , 0, ZM02.ZSPEC3) > 999 THEN 1.82 WHEN DECODE(ZM02.ZSPEC3, '' , 0, ZM02.ZSPEC3) > 179 THEN 2.90 END) ZSPEC3, MAX(ZM02.ZSPEC7) ZSPEC7, MAX(CS126B.CS126_USD) USD, MAX(CS126B.CS126_UGS) UGS, MAX(CS126B.CS126_UHJ) UHJ, MAX(CS126B.CS126_UMS) UMS, SUM(CS126B.CS126_AMT) AMT, MAX(CS126B.CS126_ADT) ADT, MAX(CS126B.CS126_FMY) FMY, MAX(CS126B.CS126_FMS) FMS, SUBSTR(MAX(CS126B.CS126_ADT),1,6) AYM, MAX(CS126B.CS126_KND) KND FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 CS126B LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 CS157 ON CS157.MANDT = CS126B.MANDT AND CS157.CS157_UPN = CS126B.CS126_UPN AND CS157.CS157_CST = CS126B.CS126_CST AND CS157.CS157_PJT = CS126B.CS126_PJT AND CS157.CS157_HNO = CS126B.CS126_HNO AND CS157.CS157_SEQ = CS126B.CS126_SEQ AND CS157.CS157_GND IN ('C','D'), ( SELECT CS126E.MANDT, CS126E.CS126_UPN, CS126E.CS126_CST, CS126E.CS126_PJT, CS126E.CS126_HNO, CS126E.CS126_USD, CS126E.CS126_UHJ, MAX(CS126E.CS126_SEQ) CS126_SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 CS126E, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB010 WHERE CS126E.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126E.MANDT = WB010.MANDT AND CS126E.CS126_BSU = WB010.LGORT AND WB010.LGORT > '' AND CS126E.CS126_UPN = #UPN# AND CS126E.CS126_DDT = '' GROUP BY CS126E.MANDT, CS126E.CS126_UPN, CS126E.CS126_CST, CS126E.CS126_PJT, CS126E.CS126_HNO, CS126E.CS126_USD, CS126E.CS126_UHJ ) CS126F, SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028C, SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028D, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB010, SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 ZM02 WHERE CS126B.MANDT = CS126F.MANDT AND CS126B.CS126_UPN = CS126F.CS126_UPN AND CS126B.CS126_CST = CS126F.CS126_CST AND CS126B.CS126_PJT = CS126F.CS126_PJT AND CS126B.CS126_HNO = CS126F.CS126_HNO AND CS126B.CS126_SEQ = CS126F.CS126_SEQ AND CS126B.MANDT = MM028C.MANDT AND CS126B.CS126_GND = MM028C.CODE2 AND MM028C.CODE1 = 'CS119' AND CS126B.MANDT = MM028D.MANDT AND CS126B.CS126_GKD = MM028D.CODE2 AND MM028D.CODE1 = 'CS130' AND MM028C.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028D.LANG = #G_LANG# AND CS126B.CS126_GND IN ('C','D') AND CS126B.CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126B.MANDT = WB010.MANDT AND CS126B.CS126_BSU = WB010.LGORT AND WB010.LGORT > '' AND CS126B.MANDT = ZM02.MANDT AND CS126B.CS126_PJT = ZM02.POSID AND CS126B.CS126_HNO = SUBSTR(ZM02.POSID_1,7,3) AND CS126B.CS126_UPN = #UPN#
GROUP BY CS126B.MANDT, CS126B.CS126_UPN, CS126B.CS126_CST, CS126B.CS126_GNO, CS126B.CS126_GND ) X ON CS121B.MANDT = X.MANDT AND CS121B.CS121_UPN = X.UPN AND CS121B.CS121_CST = X.CST WHERE CS121B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS121B.CS121_UPN = #UPN# AND X.KND > '' AND CS121B.CS121_CST = #CST# -- AND X.ADT = #ADT# AND X.FMY = #FMY# GROUP BY CS121B.MANDT, CS121B.CS121_UPN, CS121B.CS121_CST, X.GNO, X.USD, X.UGS, X.UMS, X.UHJ, CS121B.CS121_GNO ORDER BY CS121B.MANDT, CS121B.CS121_UPN, CS121B.CS121_CST, X.GNO ) AS FM WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY MANDT, UPN, CST, FMY, CHASU WITH UR
